kv21.4:1.1: Atthi adhippāyaiddhi buddhānaṁ vā sāvakānaṁ vāti?

kv21.4:6.4: Nanu āyasmā pilindavaccho rañño māgadhassa seniyassa bimbisārassa pāsādaṁ “suvaṇṇan”tveva adhimucci, suvaṇṇo ca pana āsīti?
kv21.4:6.6: Hañci āyasmā pilindavaccho rañño māgadhassa seniyassa bimbisārassa pāsādaṁ “suvaṇṇan”tveva adhimucci, suvaṇṇo ca pana āsi, tena vata re vattabbe—
